document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

Chorotype. Ð¡entralasiatic-European-Mediterranean (1.06 Ð¡EM) northwards to the Baltic Sea ( Latvia ). Phenology. April to September.
Published data. Iran (Uhmann et al . 2005, general distribution); Lorestan (Uhmann 1985).

Comments. All records for Iran based on misidentified specimens of
A. nadari (Pic)
and
A. nemrod
(LaF.) according to Kejval (2006) . This species does not occurs in Iran .
